item.title: Manatee County Commissioners still up in the air on a possible boat ramp on Cortez
item.description: County Commissioner Tal Siddique said there has been talk from the community and the board to create a waterfront dining or lease out portions of the land.

item.title: Lost ID found on island 20 years later reconnects woman with life before Hurricane Katrina
item.description: A wildlife biologist spotted a lost high school identification card in the sand dating back nearly two decades.

Two suspects enter plea deals in Punta Gorda murder-for-hire case
item.description: Both received sentences of over 10 years in prison for criminal conspiracy to commit murder.

item.title: Erin now a Category 5 Hurricane
item.description: Erin is a powerful storm, but stays out to sea.
